website_summaries.verdict: Give this sturdy wheel a try if you're already fit but tired of the sit-up/push-up routine.
pros: Easy assembly.Can be used to strengthen and tone abs, shoulder, arms, and back
cons: No spring-assisted return, but this ensures you work your abs harder

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Wouldn't recommend for someone over 150 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks cool. I put mine together, laid it on the ground and went into push up position with it in my hands and it crumbled under me. I weigh 230 lbs. The delivery driver had only made it to the next house and this thing became garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Silent, Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing for over 4 years now, and it's still going strong. It's sturdy, balances well, rolls easily, and is virtually silent on a carpeted floor. After using this for a while, someone gave me a "Deluxe Ab Roller" from a different manufacturer that costs a lot more than this one. I tried it once and never used it again -- It didn't roll easily, which I suppose could be a "design feature", but the biggest negative was that it made annoying noises when rolling. I went back to this simple device. If it ever breaks, I'll buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: PQ

customer_reviews.title: This thing is 100X better than the BS "planking routines" and "ball sit ups" ...
customer_reviews.text: Still have my 6 pack at 34 years old. Only ab workout I do and will do until I can't walk anymore. This thing is 100X better than the BS "planking routines" and "ball sit ups" any trainer will show you. Also works your shoulders, lats and really builds core strength.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Does the Trick AB Wheel
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been using the AB wheel for the past two weeks and we have both have definitely felt it in our lower and upper abs. I started only able to do 3-5 and after two weeks I am now able to do 10-12. I have felt sore for days which is what I wanted. The wheel rolls smoothly with your movement and the grip of the handles is pretty good. It wasn't expensive and I had been wanting one for a while so I am very please with my purchase and hope it latest a while before we need to replace it. Thanks Valeo!
customer_reviews.author: LVP

customer_reviews.title: Its a pretty good tool that helps break up the monotony of ...
customer_reviews.text: I work in front of the computer at home and have been using weights and other equipment around the house when I can't get to the gym. I purchased this about a year ago, I use it about once or twice a week and it's held up really well. One Note, I went to Youtube and searched some Ab Wheel exercises to make sure I was using it properly and not hurting myself. The pictures in the user manual were confusing. Its a pretty good tool that helps break up the monotony of sit ups.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Ab shredder
customer_reviews.text: This little wheel is awesome! From someone who does loads of core strengthening exercises through reformer Pilates this wheel is on point! I haven’t been able to achieve sore abdominal muscles from my Pilates workouts in a couple months now and with this little guy I was able to make that happen. I did 5 sets of 10 (not going quite all the way down as this is hard!) and let me tell you I feel amazing and woke up with the same kind of abdominal cuts today that a good Pilates workout will leave me with. So excited to do this again and again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Loulou

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for your abs and protects your spine at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: I like the grips and I like that the bars are straight out. Occasionally my right wrist will hurt doing these but I don't know if that's because of the straight bar or my wrist is just a wuss. In case you weren't already aware, you should stop doing crunches and start using this. You really never want to be twisting or bending your spine. With the wheel, you're able to work your abs while keeping your back straight.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W

customer_reviews.title: Not stable!!
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to be a simple straightforward ab roller. Very easy to assemble ( literally 3 steps) but not sure if I’m missing a piece. There is nothing to keep the wheels in the center. The actual rod is kuch longer than the picture and there is a lot of space for the wheels to move around while using it. Hence, it’s not stable as the wheels “ slide out” while rolling. It didn’t come with set up instructions so cannot confirm if the design included anything for the wheels to stay in place. It still works but Due to the instability, makes it much less Functional and less fun. Hope the makers read this and do something about it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Great ab workout
customer_reviews.text: This ab wheel is great for the price. The wheel itself is made of hard plastic. The double wheel design makes the product rotate very easily while in use. While the texture provides grip on soft surfaces, like what you find at the gym, it's not so great on wood (or laminate) floors. If you'll be using this on hard floors like wood, tile, or concrete, I'd choose a wheel with a rubber texture. Press the "Helpful button" if this review helped inform your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: When I received it it felt a bit low quality, but after many uses I have no complaints. It is definitely a work out and there are additional ab work outs on youtube using this type of device. If you're into planks and or just trying to mix up your ab routine I would suggest this as a fun work out. It was unique to me and had me feeling it from my forearms, shoulders, and abs so for me it was well worth the money as a change up to my typical static routines.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and of quality as well. I advise to look up a YouTube video on the proper form when using the roller. Almost hurt my back a couple of times by doing the wrong physical work out form. But the product is great and I can definitely feel the impact and muscle contraction when using it and after using it. I can tell I'm going to see results
customer_reviews.author: faith

customer_reviews.title: Rolls smooth, leaves marks
customer_reviews.text: The wheels from this roller will leave black scuff marks on most hard surfaces (wood, concrete, linoleum, etc.). Should be fine if you use it on carpet or black mats. The grips on the handles fit comfortably into the palms, with grooves for your fingers. The wheels roll smoothly around the shaft, but there's no spacer between the two wheels, so the move horizontally along the shaft during rolling, creating a bit of instability.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Shattered on first use.
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews but here I am at the gym writing one. On my first use, both plactic rims of the wheels just shattered.
customer_reviews.author: Tihomir M.

customer_reviews.title: Your basic, run of the mill ab roller at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special here but it does what it's supposed to do. I have used on just like this for years. Same on in the gym for everyone and it has survived and works great. It can be hard on the shoulders and wrists, but that is because of the exercise, not the piece of equipment. Others may be more ergonomic but I cannot speak to how much they actually alleviate any problems this one may present. In conclusion, if you need a good ab roller and a great price get this one. I research everything I buy and I choose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Works but better options
customer_reviews.text: I mean it works, but it's cheap and kind of uncomfortable (not in a good way). I got the "SKLZ Core Wheels Dynamic Strength & Ab Trainer" instead. Much more flexible, way more comfortable grip, seems much higher quality. Same basic motion, same ab workout.
customer_reviews.author: I buy stuff and stuff

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it, waste of time!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these items for my boyfriend and I and both of the boxes came on time but one box wasn’t missing a handle bar. The second box the metal pole didn’t even fit through the wheel and it looked used and scratched up compared to the other box. It’s completely unacceptable to order a new items and receive used goods that don’t even work! Frauds. The website for support help doesnt even offer customer help option. I live in nyc and work full time with barely any time to drop off items to post office for returns. So upset I have waste my time to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, not the best quality material, but works
customer_reviews.text: Made out of mostly plastic and the quality just wasn't there. It works and it's cheap but even the handles are so thin, hurts my hands to hold it for a while. I guess you get what you pay for. The balance is also not that great. It shakes while I roll it on a carpet because of uneven distribution of weight, I guess. Also, putting the sleeve on the handle was very painful. Took a WHOLE LOT of force, and I felt like I was breaking it. If you can spend some more money, pay for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: FromFarEast

customer_reviews.title: Great for abs and a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this ab wheel for a couple weeks and I can already see my abs are starting to show more. You can really feel it in your abs when you use it. Just make sure to keep your abs flexed and only have your knees touching the ground. When you are assembling this, make sure to use some soap or lotion to get the handles on, but after that, it is very easy to use. I would recommend this product if you are looking to get a good ab workout, and it is at a very good price compared to other wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Kamil

customer_reviews.title: Improved flexibility.  Better stability.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. I waited to write the review until I really got use out of it. First in my opinion its quality approved. Perfect for beginners. Better than others I've bought. Great stability. Less pain. I ordered 4 more for friends. A must have for every adult. Great value for the money. Would order again. Fast shipping and they work amazing. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: dawn shippy

customer_reviews.title: Quick, cheap, easy. And does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Used to strengthen core muscles. Bit of a learning curve, it did agitate my golfers elbow as you will have to grip it quite tight at the bottom. I have learned that the best way to train abs without damaging your back is to eliminate spinal flexion and just focus on the abs job as a stabilizing force that keeps your torso in a neutral position like planks.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: First ab wheel experience is great
customer_reviews.text: I did some research about different types of ab wheels. Many training experts mention that if you can keep correct posture and use the right muscle groups, then a basic ab wheel will have the same result as those fancy expansive ab wheels. It has worked fine with me so far after I found the correct posture and how to use my abdominal muscles correctly.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS DESCRIBED OR AS PICTURED AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: tell me how this package that I received is supposed to look like the one that is shown in the product's pictures. definitely a waste of my money as it can't even be used.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wright

customer_reviews.title: Simple design, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I tried one of these at a friend's house and I decided to pick one up for myself to add to my workout. Its super easy to use and compact enough to do in my small apartment. I highly recommend it for people who don't have time to go to a gym, but still want to put in some hard work. For those who have never used it before I would recommend watching a youtube video on proper form or else you could strain your back.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: gave me abs of steal
customer_reviews.text: i once took a bullet to the abs and it bounced right back at that crook.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and you better already have upper body strength to use correctly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: This thing is ok, I use it for home and workouts. The handle does hurt your hands with the crisscross pattern but I do like that it’s solid. I wish the wheel was one big piece rather than two to give it more stability. All in all it does do the job of an ab workout but I still prefer the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I think the invention of the wheel was supposed to make it easier to move things. I guess its easier to move things with a wheel as long as they aren't lazy people like myself. I guess its the thought that counts. The one time I did use the wheel it worked great but unless it has a gas pedal I wouldn't count on me getting the wheel to move again.It works great for killing bugs but I haven't tried it yet for making tortillas. It is a good product, however, and it will give you a great abdominal workout. I guess I just need to roll off the couch and force myself to workout more.
customer_reviews.author: Blizaz

customer_reviews.title: it's ok, basic stuff
customer_reviews.text: it's easy to understand how to assemble the device but very difficult to push the handle grip into the axis. the cost of making this product is around $ 1 including box and instruction paper not that good design for assembling but it does the job. With this price , I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Working out abs
customer_reviews.text: This item is great however my trainer told me not to use it. I think it’s made for people w an already strong core. My trainer didn’t want me to injure my self by arching my back. But if your someone who is experienced w working out I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: gregory

customer_reviews.title: Works great for tightening abs!
customer_reviews.text: This ab roller wheel is a real challenge; I can really feel the stretch in my abdominal muscles and especially in my arms. Since I’m middle-age and not all that strong, I roll out in front of a wall, which makes it doable. Takes practice but I’ve already noticed a little tighter stomach—highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BAR112

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing, I saw a difference in my abs in a week and I felt it everywhere in my core after the first workout. Not a bunch of moving parts so seems like it would be hard to break and fairly small so you can take it anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Berro

customer_reviews.title: arrived with a open box and a handle missing!
customer_reviews.text: very very amateur...product arrived in a opened box with a handle missing! send me another over night!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome upper body workout for $11.44! Can't get that at gym!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent way to work on core strength, HOWEVER- watch video, and research as to doing correctly! If your shoulders or back hurt- you are doing it wrong!
customer_reviews.author: sue warner

customer_reviews.title: I doubted but
customer_reviews.text: I found so many similar AB wheel and would like to buy expensive & nice looking one instead of this. My husband told me this one will be enough and try first. He was right. Our family is using this and very durable even it is plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple Exercise Add
customer_reviews.text: Lots of options making choice hard. Grabbed this one and it works great. Left at my gym and plan to get another. Could easily transport as it dis & reassemles in 60 seconds with small components, but I'm lazy figure others can enjoy it at the gym when I'm not using it.
customer_reviews.author: SPENCER GILES

customer_reviews.title: not the best stability but for the price is ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok for the price and for the moment, really easy to assemble I just feel that when you do the exercise it doesn’t give you that much of stability. I think if I’m skinnier and athletic probably would be better so if you are a beginner as me I recommend to buy a bigger version.
customer_reviews.author: Anny cancino

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I envisioned it being larger, but it fits the description. Nice little item to have. Seems very well made. Nice addition to our home gym, even if the suspension trainer we've since bought can pretty much mimic the same exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Go Tigers!

customer_reviews.title: Floor destroyer.
customer_reviews.text: The profile destroys floors. When using it it left dents and imprints in our wooden floor. The plastic is too hard.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smola

customer_reviews.title: Great portable exercise machine!
customer_reviews.text: Really simple product that is easy to put together as well as take apart if you want to store it or travel with it. It's not a very complex design; it is literally a wheel on a bar. Yet, it is such an awesome device that makes exercising your abs simple (well, it's not very simple to do) and somewhat fun! I try to do 10 reps whenever I get some free time and I notice that my abs are certainly getting stronger and more toned! Great little product and not too expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Roll Away!
customer_reviews.text: You're probably not buying this to paint your walls. If you are, I want pictures. For those using it as an abdominal strengthening tool, you're in good company. It is precisely what you want. The grips are not squishy, but they are molded to be comfortable for short sessions. The dual wheels ensure it's stable, and I have confidence in it holding solid. Assembly makes tying your shoes seem difficult in comparison. Comes with a short paper on proper form during exercises. In case Google is not your friend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Winn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect workout tool to retain those abs!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Cheap! This gets the job done as well as the other expensive counterparts. -Easy construction and storage Cons: -The wheels are hard rubber but it can still dig into your hard wood floor as if it was plastic, so I would lay down some workout mats or yoga mats for it to roll on. -The handle is a bit uncomfortable, its made of hard rubber and having your whole body weight on it can hurt quite a bit, Wear gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Akai

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Dynamic planks. Takes ab exercises to a whole new level from the standard sit ups, leg raises & planks. Note: product demands moderate level of initial ab strength.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for the six pack.
customer_reviews.text: Used properly, this wheel is a great addition to any ab routine. Depending on your angle of attack, you can hit your central core or obliques with ease. It rolls freely and feels sturdy. The only improvements I could see would be to add a washer along the wheels and previous to the handle grip to prevent binding. Also, make certain to keep your thumbs away from the spokes as they can be quite sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Taheri

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this little tool to work on my midsection . I use it everyday . It was somewhat easy to put together but needed a little help with the tighten of the handles. I wish the handles were more soft they have a hard grip. It’s easy to use and I can feel the soreness after using it from one day.
customer_reviews.author: kiesaboo

customer_reviews.title: Great Roller. Durable & Study
customer_reviews.text: I own & run a private fitness studio. We’ve use a wide variety of equipment & and assortment of companies. These are very Strong & Durable Ab rollers. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Did not work well.
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all, don't waste your time in my opinion. I couldn't do the ab workouts without falling because of the build on this gadget.. I've used other ab wheels that was able to hold up while you went down but for some reason this one was unnecessarily hard to maneuver. Ended up returning it and sticking to planks and sit ups. It was a bummer because I really did want to utilize it o strengthen my core.
customer_reviews.author: KayOh

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but you wouldn't know it by looking at my abs!!
customer_reviews.text: I do situps, on a bench, when at home. While traveling, bringing a bench is out of the question. I chose this specific model because it's inexpensive, and can be quickly disassembled to fill very little room in my luggage, and weigh almost nothing. The ab wheel works excellent. It is such a simple device with such great results. I'm not gonna lie, it's hard to use effectively. Your abs and back will hurt the first week or so, but things will get better. I got my 6 pack back, after about 4 weeks of use. Now Chuck Norris could punch me in the stomach........if he wishes to break his hand. Til next time Chucky!
customer_reviews.author: Aussie Bossy

customer_reviews.title: Great for abs
customer_reviews.text: This is really great for ab workouts, just a couple reps and the next day I feel like I got kicked in the stomach 20 times. However, it isn't as stable as the ones with the wider/wider set wheels, and after a while it hurt my back to use
customer_reviews.author: kyla

customer_reviews.title: Roll out your back problems.
customer_reviews.text: Had back surgery and they fused T-10 down to my pelvis. A very big deal to try and recover from. It is now 5.5 months from the date of surgery and I am using this contraption to try and regain my core strength again. It is a very slow start but getting better..
customer_reviews.author: Paul 1946

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: It's an ab roller. Sticks good to carpet and rubber mats. Okay grip as well. The plastic grips can sort of come off if trying to use this this at an angle.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product, my abs hurt
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Valeo ab wheel...I'm a very active person (tough mudders, insanity, p90x, half marathons, skiing, and general debauchery) and though it would be a nice little addition. The first time I used the ab wheel it kicked my ass in a big way. Great product and definitely targets your abs in a way you probably won't be used to. You can also pretty much make it as easy or hard as you'd like---try doing it standing up!
customer_reviews.author: DanN

customer_reviews.title: It hurts so good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lord does this thing kick the crap out of my core. It's super easy to put together and comes with a basic workout instructions. That basic workout was super effective and really gets your abs burning. I've been using it 5 times a week for 7 weeks and I can see my belly fat disappearing. Great addition to a diet and workout routine
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Pure Delight While Playing Inside
customer_reviews.text: I like that the product can be put together and be taken a part. I've used it thus far for at least a month and I'm completely satisfied with my purchase. It come with a book that shows you how to keep good form and protect your body. My only problem is that because the handles have a pattern on them, it makes it painful for them to be held if doing more than 10.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Good price but a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised but it just seems a little cheap and lack luster. It does not have a spring assist so you will really have to work hard at performing the exercise (is that a bad thing?). If you stick with it however you will notice some changes. I don't think this will give you a six pack as some may think but it will absolutely strength your core and possibly help with small back pain that you may have. It will also strengthen your core to the point that you can perform more advanced exercises that will in turn help you achieve that six-pack that you want.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Family

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Let me first say that I bought this Valeo Ab Wheel to strengthen my core strength. The I wanted to strengthen my core strength was because my core was the limiting factor in the big lifts (Military Press, Squat, and Deadlift). I am really impressed by the simplicity and ergonomical design. Also, the easy assembling instructions (can't forget about that). Overall, I would recommend this product to anyone attempting to strengthen your core. P.S if your lower back hurts or hyper extends using this, it is not the products fault. The reason for this is that your abs are too weak and your back has to compensate.
customer_reviews.author: Musclesbrah24

customer_reviews.title: Sore and loving it!
customer_reviews.text: My abs hurt after using this, and I'm a 5+ workout a week kind of person. I do various ab focused routines throughout the week, but this product clearly targeted my midsection better than most things I've tried. I'm talking ab soreness for 2 days...which in my opinion is a good thing. Means it's working. Just remember to use your core the whole time, as I can see how some people could strain their back with this if used improperly.
customer_reviews.author: AMel065

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia ab workouts
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought something like this on TV over a decade ago for $40 and I remember using it and how it would work my abs really hard. Saw this a few months ago and wanted to give it a try. The exact same burn comes back, so it's a good ab worker. The nostalgia it brings back is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tran

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, smooth role and big ebough handles for my hands. When using on a wood floor you can hear it roll and it isn’t exactly quiet, wheels are plastic with a hard rubbery coating but it does NOT mark my floors. The grips are hard plastic too.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good core workout
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it is simple to use, portable and takes up little room. It has comfortable hand grips and doesn't seem to mark the floor. From a kneeling position, simply roll out away from your body as far as you are comfortable. DO NOT go too far at first. Your back will let you know if you do. Vary the angle from side to side as you push out, tightening your abs and working your core. Do not bow your lower back or put it in a strain. Ease into the workout. I now do two sets of 50 extensions, but that has taken months on a similar model to get where I want to be.
customer_reviews.author: beatwalker

customer_reviews.title: Strong, cheap and light. Perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Five stars because it's strong, cheap and light - three things that almost never exist in one item. I try to do some kind of strength training every day and it was a problem when I traveled until I got this ab wheel, which disassembles and drops into a knapsack or computer bag. It's also easy to use. Many YouTube videos show you how. Impossible (for me) from a standing position. From the knees, it's more do-able, but I haven't yet experienced the sore core that others speak of.
customer_reviews.author: DenkoB

customer_reviews.title: this ab wheel feels sturdy and I can tell it can definitely work out ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner in this "getting fit" journey and am nowhere near "in shape". That being said, this ab wheel feels sturdy and I can tell it can definitely work out not only ab muscles, but shoulders and back as well. I can also see how easily it would be to injure yourself. This comes with the pieces unassembled. The two wheels, the handle bar with one hand grip already on it, and the second handgrip. All you have to do is slip the wheels on the handle bar and slip the 2nd rubber hand grip on. Done!
customer_reviews.author: ksc30

customer_reviews.title: Great core workout
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, durable, and a great core workout. Could cause some problems if you have a back injury. Ease yourself in, this thing will kick your butt.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The usefulness of the product is great, the first time I used it, I had an incredible abdominal experience. However, the second time I used it, the plastic is so poor in quality that it broke at the wheel in the middle of the exercise causing me to cut my hand on the plastic. I was not even using full force on the product and it broke. The AB whee itself is a great idea but I recommend a different kind because of the poor quality of this one. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Runyon

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Durable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, works as intended, durable, and the entire family can use it. This is my 2nd purchase because the one I had for years got lost during a move.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: WHAT IT IS
customer_reviews.text: A simple, well known and effective, device for working the abdomen. This AB WHEEL could easily last longer than the owners and those who inherit one that was heavily used. The double wheel improves directional stability and the shape of the grips assure a good firm hold. The only part that is metal is the bar that passes through the double wheels. It's both light weight and solidly built. This is not a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Bill McLean

customer_reviews.title: Love this wheel!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen people using these wheels in the gym but never gave them a second thought. I decided to incorporate wheel exercises into my ab workout and purchased this wheel. What a wonderful product. It works well, is very comfortable to use and I have definitely seen results. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KCatananzi

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a roller to use at home for my rest days from running and lifting. I read reviews on a few ab rollers and decided on this brand due to the positive feedback frpm other users. It is easy to set-up. The wheels are a bit tight but I used a kitchen mallet and they slid right in. It comes with instructions in case you do not know how to perform the exercises properly. The wheels rollout/in with ease. Considering the cost, it is made from sturdy materials and is lightweight and fits well into a small gym bag. I do recommend this product for all fitness levels.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Laranjeiro

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS! Best ab workout and not a gimmick
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big exerciser, various gyms, working out in some way every day and I love this. I take it on vacations with me and use it every other day or so. My current routine: ab rolls straight out on my knees x 20, 20 V-ups, 20 side crunches, 20 supermans and repeat x3-5. Good little routine, good core workout, and I can do it anywhere with a floor soft enough in 5-10 minutes. It's great. The best tools are often the simplest. This is simple and works your entire core just by rolling 3 feet down the floor. It's aweseom!
customer_reviews.author: Bitey (the big one)

customer_reviews.title: Quality Equipment!
customer_reviews.text: The ab roller is well built. It is sturdy due to the double wheel design. The axle/handles is very durable and will not bend under body weight. Really gives a good ab / leg workout!
customer_reviews.author: L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Our gym closed their doors. My husband used the ab wheel there 5 times a week. LA Fittness doesn't provide them so he ordered this one. It's well made and very durable. No complaints from him.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony & Brenda Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Simple but effective
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a day but let me say that the simpler it is the less likely something will go wrong. There is some assembly required and you don't need any power tool or anything. The two wheels are separate, the metal bar is separate and the hand grips are separate. Take the metal bar and place it threw the holes of the two wheels. Then take the hand grips and slide them over the metal bars. Make sure the hand grips are both facing the same direction other wise you will have a hard time adjusting them later. That's pretty much it. Tried it out for 5 minutes and my stomach is sore. Easy and effective workout.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Almost Flawless.
customer_reviews.text: Got this thing over a year ago to add some variety to my workouts. Turns out this is a must-have piece for any personal collection of workout equipment. Believe everything positive you have read or will read from other reviews. Good: quality, effectiveness, and look. There is one negative that keeps it from getting the full 5 stars, though. The handles can become very uncomfortable if it's used for an extended period of time (caused by the groves visible in the picture); but a simple pair of workout gloves solves the problem. Four-and-a-half stars would be a more fitting score.
customer_reviews.author: STAT

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy, used once, did not feel comfortable, I wish I could return it. I do not recommend, I ordered a different one that the whole family likes much better and use every day.
customer_reviews.author: Angels

customer_reviews.title: So far it works fine
customer_reviews.text: In order to assemble the product it was not that easy. Everytime I workout my hand hurts because of the grip. I guess it is pretty decent priced but I would expect the quality to be little better.
customer_reviews.author: Sumit Paudel

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and useful roller!
customer_reviews.text: a great product for a cheap price, it is sturdy and easy to use/ my husband and I both use it during our workout , no issue or problem!
customer_reviews.author: Pegah

customer_reviews.title: Chiseled Abs from a plastic wheel?
customer_reviews.text: Get those chiseled abs you've always dreamed of with a simple and cost-effective alternative to those big machines. All you need is a carpeted floor and one of these ab wheels and you're on your way to your dream body! Well, at least in reality I have noticed a difference in my own abs. If you setup a good routine or follow the box instructions, you can develop some pretty sick abs if you stick to it. If money and or space is the limiting factor, and you care to keep in shape, then this is a no brainer to add to your morning workout routine.
customer_reviews.author: David Leavitt

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccommend!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this - it is a bit difficult at first to use - but once you figure it out - its an excellent workout. I have a problem doing crunches because I have nerve damage in my lower back - this is an awesome alternative! It actually helps stretch my back out and feel great while working out my abs. You have to build up to being able to use this correctly at first - but once you get it down - you will love it! I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie S.

customer_reviews.title: All in one workout
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. Easy to use. You can feel this working out your abs, shoulders, arms, and lower back. Stretch as far as you can.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Cool little tool
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner at working out, it is a cool little thing to have to remind you to workout for 10min here and there. Super easy to use. It was annoying putting it together but hey. I have no complaints only that I got suckered in to buying my first super adultlike object. Super convenient for people like me who go to college and work full time and barely have time for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Abs popping
customer_reviews.text: Great ab roller, it works better if you have knee mat so you can go longer and not worry about your knees hurting
customer_reviews.author: Sean Durica

customer_reviews.title: Ab Work ... Dangerous to your back if used improperly
customer_reviews.text: Careful with this. I've used it.. it works on muscles in the core... but its STRESSFUL and harmful to your back if used wrong. You WILL experience back PAIN if you're not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Always Careful

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I've never tried anything like this ab wheel and it's tough to do! The Valeo Ab Wheel itself looks and feels like it would never wear out under normal home use. Rugged and easily "assembled", you only need to wheels and grips on bar. My only complaint, the grips are tough hard plastic like and does make your hands ache after a while. I plan to use gloves or wrap grips with bicycle tape. Can't give you advice about using them, but would advise to check a few YT videos for proper form, start out slow, very slow...
customer_reviews.author: theunartistTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Push wheel
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. I love how easy it is to put together. It helps with wrist problems doing push-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Great core exercises.
customer_reviews.text: I am not normally a person who believes in buying plastic exercise toys, but I really like this Ab Wheel. It's not trying to cheat on exercise, because using this thing is Hard Work. I can definitely get a good workout, do doubts there. And there is a lot of variety to the core workout I can get, unlike doing crunches or planks. The construction is simple, but after a couple months of regular use it is still perfectly solid with no issues. It works on carpets and on wood floors. I have no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great AB workout
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help with my problem area, my abs. I need to add the AB wheel to my everyday workout regime. It is a good quality product and it functions properly. It can be used at any fitness level. However, I am not going to lie....It is tough! I look forward to the day when it gets easier and I can go lower to the floor. I still feel like a beginner. But I know with time and dedication I will see results.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago, but used it mostly during quarantine!! I haven’t had one problem with it, great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia K

customer_reviews.title: Works right as it should
customer_reviews.text: Love this ab wheel and I use it everyday. Easy assembly and quality hard plastic materials make this ab wheel perfect for those who want to purchase an ab wheel but not break the bank. NOTE: For the love of god be careful doing ab wheel rollouts. It’s so easy to injure your lower back, so roll with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Great Product, bad Amazon storage of it

customer_reviews.title: Great workout tool
customer_reviews.text: Great workout tool. Looked cheaply made at first, but is very sturdy. This is for people who are already in good shape, as it is a tough workout. You should already be able to do at least ten push-ups and fifty sit-ups before moving on to the Ab Roller. Six minutes a day does not sound like much. I am working up to that after a month now and my waistline is beginning to slim down. A great Amazon deal for 12 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Cudgel

customer_reviews.title: Save your back and steer away from this one.
customer_reviews.text: I am sure that many people get decent use out of a product like this and may enjoy it. Personally I am a fairly tall individual (6'2") and I sometimes have back issues. Using this product seemed to strain my back unnecessarily without providing the type of ab workout I was looking for. I would call it fairly ineffective, even after I watched several how to videos in the proper use of this piece of equipment. I ended up throwing it out since I found simply laying down on the couch, throwing my legs over the armrest and doing crunches/sit-ups from that position provided a more rigorous and effective workout while saving my back the strain of using this product.
customer_reviews.author: RoboFox

customer_reviews.title: I like this particular ab wheel because the handle bars are ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this particular ab wheel because the handle bars are a soft/hard rubbery plastic and not foam. Foam will wear out much faster. I didn't realize it before I bought it, but this ab wheel hurts my back. I think it's because my ab muscles aren't strong enough, so this might be a good piece of equipment to someone who already has stronger abs and wants to keep them tight. Maybe not good for very beginners like myself.
customer_reviews.author: !the un-irrelevant humin*

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, and very ergonomic. The only "issue" is that it's pretty hard to install. You have to put the grip handles on the ends of the metal bar and it's such a tight squeeze. I literally had to stand on it to make sure the grip handles were all the way wrapped around the metal bar. Other than that, it looks like it's a great product that will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Worth it if your work it
customer_reviews.text: The Ab Wheel is no joke, it's hard core, tough to master and a mean, mean creature. But it's stable, well constructed and up for the task if you are. Remember ab wheels don't burn fat, they build muscle, so you need to trim down to SEE results. You will feel them... Oh yes you will! Every other day is more than enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ab wheel for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic ab wheel. Owned it for about a week, use it in my living room. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: IT_Jordan

customer_reviews.title: NICE INEXPENSIVE WHEEL
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this wheel and uses it almost every morning. It seems to be a good quality and was easy to put together. My husband exercises regularly in the AM at home. Of all things I found out about these by reading a biography on President Reagan and it talked about him being in such good physical condition, which helped him survive the shooting by daily using a wheel like this. Update 03/08/2016 This still looks and works like new after nearly 2.5 years of pretty much daily use by hubby.
customer_reviews.author: Seadollar50

customer_reviews.title: To cheaply made cuts into hands
customer_reviews.text: Really painful to hold onto it cuts into ur hands, while not being comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Not a magic wheel
customer_reviews.text: Although I don't use this everyday as you shouldnt, every workout should be different section, including abs. Abs should be worked out twice a week max as they need to heal. I can definitely feel the burn on the abs and also some back area. Beginners should be careful when using this for the first couple times as they may feel back ache as I did. Other than that, this is a good workout tool to achieve the abs you want. However as they all say, abs are made in the kitchen. This isn't a Magic Wheel haha. good results come from good dieting and good workouts
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Size and ease of use is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this roller-easy to take to the gym and use in my workout, might get another for home.
customer_reviews.author: Louise. J.

customer_reviews.title: Keg to 6pack
customer_reviews.text: Turned my keg into 6 pack in 6 months by using this, eating low carb and high protein. Cut out all processed food and ate how my ancestors ate.
customer_reviews.author: SARAH

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to help stretch out my back. No complaints, the product works well!
customer_reviews.author: B4dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great for $15!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works! Can’t go wrong for $14, so far it’s held up but I’ve only owned it for a month or 2
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

product_meta.title: Dual Ab Wheel, Exercise And Fitness Wheel With Easy Grip Handles For Core Training And Abdominal Workout
feature_bullets: MOST EFFECTIVE CORE TRAINING WORKOUT: Strengthen and tone abs, shoulder, arms and back
STURDY & DURABLE: Two non-skid wheels for stability slides across any surface without wobbling or slipping for smooth controlled movements
COMFORABLE & SLIP RESISTANT GRIP: Features easy-grip handles to prevent slippage during even the most intense workout
COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT: Dual ab wheel is lightweight and portable, easy to assemble & easy to use
GREAT FOR ALL LEVELS: Fitness guide with exercises included will guide you through a complete workout

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
